content: The **Kallang Ground** is a [cricket](/wiki/Cricket) ground in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). The ground played host to nine [One-Day Internationals](/wiki/One-Day_International) in 1999 and 2000, and is a regular home ground for the [Singapore national cricket team](/wiki/Singapore_national_cricket_team). It also hosted matches in the 1999 Youth Asia Cup, the [Tuanku Ja'afar Cup](/wiki/Tuanku_Ja%27afar_Cup) in 2000 and 2004, and the 2002 [ACC Trophy](/wiki/ACC_Trophy). This article about a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) sports venue is a stub. title: Kallang Ground
